parameters.query: SELECT id, star_balance FROM users WHERE id = {{ $json.body.user_id }}
SELECT thread_id FROM user_topics WHERE user_id = '{{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.user_id }}' AND mode = 'style_transfer'

INSERT INTO user_topics (user_id, mode, thread_id) VALUES ('{{ $('Prepare Send').first().json.user_id }}', '{{ $('Prepare Send').first().json.mode }}', {{ $json.result.message_thread_id }}) ON CONFLICT (user_id, mode) DO UPDATE SET thread_id = EXCLUDED.thread_id

=INSERT INTO generations (user_id, mode, result_type, result_url, prompt) VALUES ('{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.user_id }}', 'style_transfer', 'image', '{{ $("Check Result").first().json.image_url }}', '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.prompt || "" }}')

UPDATE users SET star_balance = star_balance - {{ $('Calculate Cost').first().json.required_stars }} WHERE id = {{ $('Webhook').first().json.body.user_id }} AND star_balance >= {{ $('Calculate Cost').first().json.required_stars }};
